title: Interpretation of seeing a human being in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the following paragraphs, we explain to you the interpretation of seeing a person in a dream according to the interpretation of the great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin. Often the dreamer sees in a dream a person he knows or another unknown person, and upon waking up he continues to think a lot about the meaning of this vision, and scientists say that the interpretation is that this dream varies according to the condition of the person who was in the dream, whether he was smiling or sad. Or angry, and whether the fortune teller knew him or not, and did he talk to the fortune teller or ignore him, and for this we will show you in the next article from the Encyclopedia of Interpretation of this dream in detail.Interpretation of seeing someone in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of talking to someone I know about singlehoodDream interpretation scholars say that if she sees An unmarried girl sees in her dream someone she knows and talks to. This indicates that there are feelings for this person in the heart of the dreaming girl, and this vision may indicate his connection to her. In the future, if the vision is repeated more than once. It was said that this dream indicates that this person is thinking about the girl who had the dream and that he wants to communicate with her and marry her. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is talking to someone she knows but he is ignoring her, this is a sign that He hates her in reality and intends to harm her, harm and conspire against her. If a girl sees in her dream someone she knows looking at her guiltily, this is a sign of the responsibility he bears in his heart towards her. Interpretation of seeing someone in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream someone she knows, this is a sign of The dreamer cares about this person in real life and thinks about him a lot. If he talks to someone in her dream and speaks in a sad tone, this is evidence of his injustice towards her and that he carries in his heart reproach and blame for her. If a married woman sees in her dream someone she knows, but he ignores her and does not want to talk to her. This indicates that he is in reality estranged from her or that she is angry with her. Seeing a famous person in a married woman’s dream and his appearance is sad and broken, means that he is in a bad state and she must ask him and take care of him until he improves. Interpretation of seeing a person in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in If she dreams of someone she knows, this is a sign that she will give birth to a child with the same characteristics as this person. If a pregnant woman sees someone in her dream and smiles when she sees him, this is a sign that she wants to meet him and talk to him in reality. Seeing a familiar face in a dream for a pregnant woman but he ignores her and does not want to talk With her, this is a sign that she is going through a bad situation. If a pregnant woman dreams in her dream that someone she knows is putting his hands on her stomach, then this dream carries a warning about the need to take care of her pregnancy, her health, and the health of her fetus. Seeing someone she hates in a dream, the great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says: If The sleeper saw in his dream a person he hates, and the dreamer knew him in reality, then this is an unpleasant vision, and it indicates the loss of money or the loss of the work in which the fortuneteller works. And if the sleeper sees in his dream that there is a person who he hates and who arouses feelings of anger and hatred, but he does not know that, then this vision ing

And if the sleeper sees in his dream that there is a person who he hates and who arouses feelings of anger and hatred, but he does not know that, then this vision ing

title: Interpretation of seeing a corpse in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a corpse in a dream is good news because it relieves pain and helps people escape crises and alleviate difficult situations. From your website gptafser.com/, we will explain to you that you see the carcass in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing a corpse in a dream for one girl. The interpretation of a single woman’s dream of offering a sacrifice indicates that she has high goals and will do whatever it takes to achieve them. If the dreamer consumes the meat of the carcass Raw. The vision does not bode well, but rather leads to failure in daily life. And the challenges facing achieving the goals of the union owner. See also: Interpretation of dreams about a carcass. Interpretation of seeing a frame in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream of a carcass is a sign of increased material wealth and abundance of food. If The visionary is currently experiencing difficulties and sees a corpse in her dream. This portends a quick solution to her suffering, as well as the death of her problems and anxiety. The meaning of seeing a corpse in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a carcass foretells an imminent pregnancy, and God Almighty is Wise. But if the dreamer is a mother, this portends the health of her children, their loyalty to her, and their superiority in Their study. Aside from the possibility that a married woman is currently arguing with her husband. Her dream of sacrificing a calf predicts that these conflicts will soon end and that they will feel happy and psychologically stable. If a pregnant woman dreams of a corpse during the first months of her pregnancy. It preaches that they will be born male and that her future child He will be virtuous. The dream symbolizes that the woman’s due date is approaching, so she needs to prepare for childbirth. Read also: To see in your dream that you are cutting the meat of a lamb. Interpretation of seeing a corpse in a dream about a man and its meaningAccording to the interpretation of a dream about a man offering a sacrifice, it represents healing for the sick. Saving money For the needy, comforting the needy and relieving the pressure. If one sees himself killing a sheep in a dream as a sacrifice. This portends professional advancement, reaching the highest levels and fame. When the man watches her, she grabs a knife and kills the lamb. It indicates that he will defeat the two enemies, and get rid of their plans and evil. Interpretation of seeing a corpse in A dream for the unemployed. If the unemployed dreamer sees himself slaughtering a sheep in a dream. This portends that he will soon find a great job opportunity with great financial rewards. If you dream of raw meat, it means that you are not doing your duty. And you should hurry to repent before it is too late. And when you see that you are boiling meat and it is not cooked. It shows that you are searching for something and it does not come true for you until after a long time. Seeing raw meat and blood dripping, means that you will face very difficult times and have to endure these problems. You may be interested in: Seeing a sheep being slaughtered in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Hanging CorpseThe presence of hanging sacrifices in a dream indicates that the dreamer is trying to atone for a certain sin. If he fails, it means that he will leave the pain of the past behind him. He will enter a new phase of his life full of achievements and happiness. Dreaming of MassacreAccording to the interpretation of dreams, slaughtering a corpse in a dream is not a good omen. Alternatively, the dreamer is expected to experience some undesirable circumstances

title: Interpretation of seeing a river in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We present to you Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the river in a dream. Seeing a river in a dream is one of the most common visions that people are constantly looking for an interpretation of. We find that scholars differed in the interpretation of the river in a dream. Some of them believe that seeing the river in a dream is one of the visions that brings goodness and abundance to whoever sees it, and some believe that the river in some situations is a sign of evil, and its interpretation harms some people. What determines its interpretation and meaning is the condition of the dreamer in the dream. Also, the condition of the river, the color of the water, as well as the difference in whether the dreamer is male or female. Today’s article we will shed light on the interpretation of a dream about a river in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail in the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a river in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a river in general in a dream indicates the presence of a just ruler in the country or a just person in the dreamer’s life who arbitrates between disputes. With justice. But if a person sees in his dream the river in a state of high tide and the water is rising, then this indicates the abundance of goodness and wide and abundant food, and it is on its way to whoever sees it soon, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for the one who sees in his dream that the river has reduced his wealth or that it is in a state of decline , this means that the dreamer will suffer from some problems and worries, whether in his work or in his family life, but they will be so. By order of God. As for seeing the river itself overflowing and leaving its usual place and emerging onto the public road, this is a sign that the one who had the vision will suffer grave injustice, and God Almighty is High. But seeing the river running so fast that it cuts down trees as it passes, is a sign of salvation for the beholder from A clear injustice was done to him by God’s command and facilitation, and there will be relief from anguish and sorrows. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing the river flowing and taking the dreamer’s food with it in a dream, this was due to the presence of an enemy of the pioneer, but he has power, money, and prestige and wants to take the dreamer’s money by force without his consent. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Digging a river in a dream. If the dreamer sees himself trying to dig a river, this is a sign that the dreamer will be blessed by God with abundant money and abundant sustenance by God’s command. As for the fortuneteller who sees himself trying to drink from the river, this is an indication that the fortuneteller will deal with his friend. Power, money and prestige, but this person will take away all his rights from the fortuneteller and God will wrong him. . Forbidden. As for whoever sees himself drowning in the river in his dream, it is a sign of many problems that he will face in his life, and it is the direct reason for the dreamer’s inability to achieve his dreams and goals that he desires and seeks. And God Almighty is All-Knowing. As for whoever sees himself swimming in a river with murky waters, it is an indication that the dreamer is committing many sins and disobedience, so he repents, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for whoever sees himself in a dream turning into a river, then his vision indicates the nearness of the dreamer’s death. And God alone is the Most High, and He knows the ages and destinies. Crossing a River in a Dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is crossing a river, his dreams indicate that he will obtain abundant goods, a lot of money, and an increase in his livelihood, and all his wishes will come true. As for the dreamer who sees himself crossing a river to reach

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a bathroom in a dream for a married woman?

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman and its meaning in detail. The dove is actually one of the birds that symbolizes peace and freedom. It is also one of my favorite birds among many people. It is common in many squares in European countries, which attracts tourists, who feed them and want to take souvenir photos with them, but what about seeing this bird in a dream? A married woman...Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman generally means that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Imam Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing a black dove in a dream indicates marital problems and disagreements. As for bathing, for a married woman it indicates the sins and disobedience that she commits. If a married woman sees pigeons entering her house in a dream, this vision symbolizes the stability of marital life and the happiness she enjoys with her husband. If you see black pigeon feathers, this vision is repulsive and indicates that you are exposed to marital infidelity. As for the married woman who sees herself cooking A pigeon in a dream, this vision symbolizes love and tenderness between her and her husband. Seeing a cooked pigeon in a dream is a praiseworthy vision for a married woman and indicates kindness and ease of things for her. If a married woman sees a slaughtered white pigeon in a dream, this vision indicates her problems with Her husband or with his family. We present to you the most prominent interpretations of seeing pigeons in a dream for a married woman. Before we conclude this article, we would like to note that all of these mentioned interpretations represent the jurisprudence of Sharia interpretations. We cannot be sure of their fulfillment in reality because God alone knows the unseen. To interpret another dream, you can Download the instant application to interpret dreams from the encyclopedia.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing shifting sand in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing quicksand: Sand is considered one of the most important natural resources because glass is extracted from it and is used in many different industries. It is a great treasure. A person may see in his dream that he is walking on sand or that he is collecting sand. This vision is good or bad, and its interpretation varies according to many indicators. Walking on sand can indicate your preoccupation with some religious and secular matters, and the presence of sand on tree trunks can indicate abundance and good vitality. Also, if the sand is yellow, this indicates recovery from illness, and therefore we find that there are many, many interpretations of sand, and in this article we will explain these interpretations. Interpretation of seeing sand in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing sand in a dream because it indicates death or life, because It extends to the ground, because it is from the earth, and it can indicate wealth. Seeing sand walking in a dream means restrictions. Seeing sand can indicate sadness, anxiety, and injustice, and only God is Supreme and All-Knowing. And whoever sees in his dream that he is eating sand, this vision indicates Wealth and money, God willing. Seeing sand can indicate money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is collecting sand, this vision is good, and shows the collection of money. Seeing yellow sand indicates that the sick person will recover, God willing. Interpretation of seeing sand in a dream for a single girl. If a lonely girl in the desert sees sand in a dream, this indicates that her life is full of sadness. And anxiety. If an unmarried girl sees sand on the beach in her dream, this indicates safety after many serious crises that she will be exposed to. Interpretation of sand in a dream for a married woman When a married woman sees sand in a dream, this means that she will face many difficulties in her life. As Seeing money in a dream indicates the presence of a problem, whether professionally or difficulties in collecting money. Interpretation of seeing sand in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees sand in her dream, this indicates grace and goodness in all matters of her life. Likewise, seeing sand in a dream for a pregnant woman It means that her fears will disappear and their intensity will fade. Since the pregnant woman dreams of sand, this indicates that her birth will be easy and that her fetus will be healthy. Interpretation of seeing quicksand in a dream: If a person sees in his dream that he is standing on quicksand, this indicates the loss of friends and a loss in business. If someone sees that he cannot escape from quicksand, this is a sign that he does not know what will happen to him. Other interpretations of seeing sand in a dream: Seeing sand symbolizes money, livelihood, and kindness. However, some interpreters saw it as a symbol of death. Others interpreted the fine sand of young men and women as symbolizing good living and abundance. Sand soaked in water also symbolizes negative feelings that the dreamer is experiencing. Seeing a bunch of beach sand in a dream symbolizes psychological stability For the cheater and the peace he feels in his life, God willing. Seeing quicksand may symbolize

title: I dreamed that I got engaged to my girlfriend

preview.html: I dreamed that I got engaged to my girlfriend through a website, seeing the website roy2a.com. Every young man, when he falls in love with a girl, wants to go to her family to ask for her hand in marriage, and after approval, this will be one of the happiest steps in his life. He feels the beginning of a new phase in his life and plans For his future at this time with the other party who will be his partner, and about seeing the engagement of someone you love in a dream. This is what we will talk about in this article and the most important things that the great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen said about this topic, so follow us. I dreamed that I got engaged to my girlfriend. Seeing someone’s engagement is considered You love himIn fact, one of the most common dreams, caused by psychologists, is that it is due to the strength of the dreamer's desire to achieve what he wants, that is, to meet someone he loves. Seeing a preacher in a dream denotes the dreamer's desire to feel attention and emotional feelings of love and appreciation from his loved ones. Engagement ceremony Dreams with music, dancing, and playing are considered a bad vision that indicates falling into problems and crises. Seeing an engagement without music and song is a praiseworthy vision that heralds the dreamer’s fulfillment of his desires and his success in us is the pursuit of them. Seeing in a dream indicates the engagement of a young man with the girl he loves. He will achieve what he wants and achieve his goals in life in general. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing an engagement in a dream in detail. I dreamed that I was engaged to my single lover. Seeing a single woman engaged to someone she loves in a dream is an indication of her intense desire to fulfill this desire, which will be the source of her happiness. Seeing an engaged girl’s engagement in a dream indicates this, from the same person, is an indication of a solution. Disagreement between them and the end of their problems. Seeing a girl’s engagement in a dream with someone she loves means that she will succeed in what she seeks, whether in her studies, at work, or on the emotional level. As the vision of her engagement to her lover appears in one dream, she will notice changes in her life in the coming period for the better. Read Another explanation: Interpretation of seeing a refusal to marry or engage in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of engagement with a specific person. Seeing an engagement from someone the dreamer knows in the dream. Statement of the benefit between the two parties. title: Interpretation of wind passing in a dream or seeing a person from whom wind passed in a dream

preview.html: A dream of a passing wind shows deception, the end of problems, and other interpretations that we will explain to single, married, pregnant, and divorced women and men, such as making air from the back passage and the smell. A smell or sound from Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of fart in a dream. Who saw it? Farting in a dream. If he had a will or commandment, he will not be able to fulfill it, or he would violate it. Whoever made an oath. And who saw it? The last fart in bed in a dream. He was with his wife, and he was talking to each other. And between them, even if the wind hits the sound of the speech is louder and louder, and the situation may be disturbed because of it. And who saw it? The last wind in a dream. This indicates the emergence of anxiety and distress, and speech containing humiliation and difficulty, and perhaps it was ugly praise, and whoever sees this. Skulls among people in a dream, this suggests shame. And scandal. If he sees this, wind comes out of him with a sound in the dream, unintentionally and without smell, it indicates comfort and profit, and if it was intentional and has air, then the vision indicates bad words. And who saw it? He smells the wind in a dream, there is nothing good in it. And seeing the events of the wind, whether it has a sound Or wind, it is interpreted from four aspects: scandal, joy, comfort, and bad words. Whoever has wind that makes a sound in a group of people in a dream speaks a word, and whoever spits comes out of a word, and whoever has disobedience is born. Among them are those who said that whoever sees that Causing the wind shows the appearance of anxiety and distress and talks about it, and if he is one of the people then it will be shame and scandal, and if he sees that he drove the wind. far. With the sound without intention, he is relieved and victorious. Seeing the wind coming out in a dream is one of the very beautiful visions, and it is generally ninety percent of the vision worthy of praise, as if a person sees the wind coming out of him in a dream while he is praying, this indicates his closeness to him. God Almighty, and indicates his great and many charitable deeds, and indicates that this man does many good deeds. A married man seeing a dead man, and this dead man has a wind coming out of him. Here, the vision is not about the visionary, but about the dead man himself, and this means that this dead man, if you know him, should you tell his family that he needs friendship and begging. As you can see, passing by animals in a dreamIf a married man sees in a dream an animal from which wind came out This vision indicates the end of distress, and also indicates the fulfillment of a specific desire for some people. Seeing a married man farting loudly, this vision means something from reality that whoever sees farting loudly, then this person does not respect others in the matter of dealing, and this person abuses Dealing with everyone around him. As for a married woman, her vision of the wind passing through her bad reputation shows her with great regret. Some interpreters said that this vision shows her many scandals and great regret. A married woman’s vision of the wind passing through a person indicates the disappearance of worries. As for the woman’s vision For a married woman to see wind coming out of her wife in a dream, this vision indicates relief and this vision also indicates the repayment of debts. Seeing a married woman moving in the air with a loud voice means that great calamity and great sadness will befall her. As for...

title: What dreams indicate pregnancy with twins?

preview.html: Dreams that indicate pregnancy with twins are many and varied, so he evaluated the site. Different. These dreams indicate the gender of the twins, with the exception of dreams that indicate imminent pregnancy. Dreams that indicate pregnancy with twins. There are some dreams that indicate pregnancy with twins, including that a pregnant woman dreams of birds in a dream, and there are certain types. Of birds, many commentators have confirmed that seeing it means pregnancy with twins, like a parrot. If a pregnant woman sees palm trees in her dream, this means that she is pregnant with twins and that God will bless her offspring so that her children will have a place in society, whether they are male or female. Seeing a horse is considered one of the most common dreams. Clearly indicates pregnancy with twins in a dream. When a pregnant woman sees earrings and bracelets in a dream, this is one of the signs that express the birth of twins, as well as seeing some predatory animals such as lions and tigers. Who dreams of giving birth to twins? Many women wonder about the dreams that indicate Pregnancy with twins, and one of the most obvious of these dreams is that the pregnant woman sees in her dream flocks of colored pigeons. If a woman sees a silver watch in her dream, this means that she will be pregnant with male twins, and also when she sees a large number of people gathering around a faucet to drink water. When A woman sees her husband planting trees in a dream, which means that she will become pregnant and give birth to twins. A large number of contemporary commentators have suggested that there are some signs that indicate pregnancy with twins, such as seeing numbers in a dream or seeing a nurse in a white dress. Dreams that indicate pregnancy with twins, if she sees A pregnant woman is walking with her husband on the seashore, then her husband went down into the sea and turned into a fish. This is a strange vision, but it indicates that she is pregnant with twins. If a woman sees that her hair is long and soft and she combs it for a long time, this is a vision that heralds pregnancy with twins. Money and coins are also one of the most common visions for twin girls. When a pregnant woman sees herself falling into a deep hole and cannot get out of it, this indicates that pregnancy In her womb is a twin. Read also: What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman giving birth? The good argument according to Ibn Sirin. Dreams that indicate an imminent pregnancy. There are many dreams in which a woman may predict her imminent pregnancy, especially if she has not had children before, such as when a married woman sees the slaughter of a sheep in a dream. The approaching pregnancy can be detected by seeing some dreams Strange things, such as milk coming out of the husband’s breast, and this vision also expresses that she will give birth to a male child who will have an excellent status among people and be proud of him in the future. Cats indicate the earliest date of pregnancy and are reassuring signs for a pregnant woman because they predict her safety and that she will not be harmed during pregnancy. One of the most promising visions for a woman is to see one of the prophets or messengers, as this indicates the blessing of offspring, the goodness of her family, and her status. Jewelry is one of the most common visions. In women's dreams, as they indicate the approaching date of pregnancy, I dreamed that I was pregnant with twins

title: What is the interpretation of buying white or black bread in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Bread in a dream Buying bread in a dream is one of the dreams that may require peace and assurance in the heart, and many sayings have been said about this, whether it is seen by a man, a single woman, or a married woman, and there are many types of bread. We find white or black, fino or baladi, all these details we deal with from the point of view of interpretation scholars in our current topic. What is the interpretation of buying bread in a dream? When you go to buy something that is the basics of life and you cannot go beyond it, then you are a hardworking and ambitious person who always strives for the best, In this context comes the scholars’ interpretation of the dream of buying bread. Tell us in detail what they said. Buying a living in a dream for an unmarried girl expresses the coming happiness that compensates for moments of pain, whether it is the fulfillment of an ambition on a scientific and academic level, or the fulfillment of a desire in her to become a husband. Thus. As for the young man who sees that he is buying it, he may also seek to marry a girl who has beauty and morals, or to find a suitable job that will help him build his future and form a happy family. In the case of a married man who takes great care of his wife and children, seeing him buying bread is an expression of His efforts to make everyone around him happy. Interpretation of a dream about buying inedible bread is one of the dream’s defects. It may mean that the monarch does not bear enough responsibilities, and is driven by his whims and whims, and there are people who are responsible for him, and he has to take care of them more than that. If the bread becomes moldy immediately after purchasing it, he may make a decision that he believes is right, but in reality it causes him a lot of loss. Buying bread In a dream by Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of the dream of buying bread by Ibn Sirin contains many sayings regarding the details of what a person sees in a dream, but in the end it does not deviate much from what the rest of the interpretation scholars have said. , with its root for many things depending on the type of bread: Ibn Sirin said that seeing bread or white bread is clear evidence of the goodness that he finds in his future, but this goodness will not come to him out of nowhere, but he will strive and work hard to achieve himself and reach his kingdom. Objectives: In the event that the fortuneteller pays a large sum to buy it and finds that it tastes delicious, he may find difficulties in his life like any ambitious person, but in the end he will be pleased with the result, and his happiness and joy will be in it. This is the success that arrived after a lot of effort. He also said that the type of bread made from apostasy, or black bread from unpleasant visions, may make him tired or sick, or he may owe a lot of money and he must make an offering and make an effort to be able to pay this amount. To calm down and not deal with this anxiety day and night. What does it mean to buy bread in a dream for a single woman? Buying bread in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about buying bread for a single woman is good news for her after a long wait. If a girl loves to study and acquire knowledge, she will find that her path to the pursuit of knowledge has become easier than before, and there is not much time left until she reaches the goal that she has planned and will succeed in implementing it. Draw to the utmost. As for the girl who has already finished her studies, her only hope is to become the wife of a young man who loves her, loves her, and protects him from the treachery of the world, as she emancipates.

title: Interpretation of a dream about losing a mobile phone by senior scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about losing a mobile phone Losing a phone in a dream is one of the things that greatly disturbs the sleeper and causes him fear and discomfort, because he expects some bad events to happen to him in reality. Indeed, the problems surrounding a person can increase if he loses the phone in the vision, and Ibn Sirin shows many indications that the dream confirms if you want to know the most important interpretations of the dream of losing your mobile phone and some of its meanings, you should follow us in our article. Interpretation of dreams about losing a mobile phone If you see that your mobile phone is lost in your dream, most of the meanings are often not reassuring, because losing it warns you of bad conditions that sweep your life and may be related to work or your personal relationship with some people, which means that there are new crises that appear to you and bother you, and if the girl is engaged, you may face some bad surprises, you need a break and you may think about getting out of the relationship you are in. If you see that you lose your phone in a dream and cannot find it again, the meaning indicates that there is some sad news that you will hear soon and embarrassing situations and bad times may occur for the dreamer while he is full of joy. And I hope again if he finds the lost mobile phone from him because if it is not found, the threats may become many and he may fall into many bad situations. Interpretation of a dream about losing a mobile phone by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: “Losing a phone in a dream is one of the warning signs for the sleeper, as he goes through many bad and difficult situations and may lose the task he is currently working on. Strong study of the project and successful planning for it or patience for some time. Ibn Sirin indicates that losing a mobile phone in a dream is an undesirable sign that your relationship with your partner may be tense for a long time or you may be exposed to the loss and theft of valuable things you own, such as a thief entering the house and stealing some valuable things from it, and if you find your mobile phone again, many bad things around you will be fixed and your situations will become more comfortable and safe for you. Interpretation of a dream about losing a mobile phone for a single woman When the sign sees the loss of the new phone you have in a dream, experts say that there are surprises around him and most of them are not happy and may change for the better provided that you can find the mobile phone again. He should also be careful of his actions and the procedures he takes if he sees that her phone is lost in the dream. The student can see the loss of the mobile phone in the vision and from here she must pay close attention to her studies and avoid neglecting them because she is exposed to some events and issues that bother her such as failure in it. A year or meeting circumstances that lead her to severe sadness, meaning she will go through a period of despair or disappointment, God forbid. This problem is addressed if he is able to find the phone and it is not completely lost, he will find it well and will be able to correct some bad situations and be happy in the future, God willing.
